name: Ham and Pear Panini
author: AnPan
summary: This is a twist on an old classic -- ham and cheese. Adding a fresh cut pear gives the sandwich a nice, light sweetness that you won't forget.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon light margarine (such as I Can't Believe It's Not Butter - Light ®)
directions: Spread 2 slices of bread with the mustard
Layer each with 3 slices of ham, half of the pear slices, a dash of pepper, and 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese
Lightly spread margarine on the outer sides of each sandwich
Heat a skillet or griddle over medium heat
Grill the sandwiches until the cheese is melted and the bread is golden brown, about 3 minutes per side
Cut each sandwich in half to serve
